Hi there,
I would like to perform a precheck of the below issue:
Reporting this alarm on my BTS:
6135 EN DSS DL Cell Coordination Failure - DSS configuration Error
, I have as additional information:
Supplementary alarm information:
Reason 5000) Internal error. But, no explanation can be found related to this internal error:
BTS Fault Details - NIDD<https://esnidd055.emea.nsn-net.net/NIDD/Trans/BtsFault/Details/138417?version=26.0&packageId=87712>
Or
From alarm details on WebEM:
Alarm details
Technology:
LTE
Meaning:
The DSS basic configuration for the downl...
Instruction:
1. Check the DSS configuration. 2. Parameters on both CRM client sides need to match.

If they don't match, change the configuration parameters depending on the reason from the supplementary alarm information: 2.1 Reason 5040) [feature CB006797]: Reconfigure LTE/NR to ensure that the DSS-related functionalities are enabled/supported or disabled/not supported consistently on both LTE and NR. 2.2 Reason 5041) [features CB006616, 5GC002574]: Reconfigure LTE/NR to ensure that the DSS-related functionality for Cat-M is enabled/supported or disabled/not supported consistently on both LTE and NR. 2.3 Reason 5042): Upgrade the LTE software release or disable the NR features impacting DSS that aren't supported by the current LTE release.

Honore

Precheck-15-04-2025: [Fid:6135][CRM][4G]: Supplementary alarm information: Reason 5000) Internal error. Hi there,
I would like to perform a precheck of the below issue:
Reporting this alarm on my BTS:
6135 EN DSS DL Cell Coordination Failure – DSS configuration Error
, I have as additional information:
Supplementary alarm information:
Reason
5000
) Internal error. But, no explanation can be found related to this internal error:
BTS Fault Details - NIDD
Or
From alarm details on WebEM:
Alarm details
Technology:
LTE
Meaning:
The DSS basic configuration for the downl...
Instruction:
1. Check the DSS configuration. 2. Parameters on both CRM client sides need to match.

If they don't match, change the configuration parameters depending on the reason from the supplementary alarm
information: 2.1 Reason 5040) [feature CB006797]: Reconfigure LTE/NR to ensure that the DSS-related functionalities are enabled/supported or disabled/not supported consistently on both LTE and NR. 2.2 Reason 5041) [features CB006616, 5GC002574]: Reconfigure
LTE/NR to ensure that the DSS-related functionality for Cat-M is enabled/supported or disabled/not supported consistently on both LTE and NR. 2.3 Reason 5042): Upgrade the LTE software release or disable the NR features impacting DSS that aren't supported
by the current LTE release.

2.4 Reason 5086) [feature LTE4750]: Reconfigure the parameters according to the LTE4750/5GC001856 features specification: - NRCELL/NRDSSLTE-lteNrDssUlRatio-maxNrDssRatio (NR max share requested) - responsible for reservation DL
MBSFN and normal subframes 2.5 Reason 5087) [feature LTE4750]: Reconfigure the parameters according to the LTE4750/5GC001856 features specification: - LNCEL/DSSNR-lteNrDssUlRatio-minNrDssRatio (LTE min share requested) - responsible for reservation DL MBSFN
and normal subframes 2.6 Reason 5100) [feature LTE4750]: Reconfigure the NR parameters responsible for MBSFN pattern allocation: - 5G NSA mode: NRCELL-type0SearchSpaceConfigurationIndex, - 5G SA mode: NRCELL-prachConfigurationIndex 3. Check the parameters
in the MOC CRMINFO. Do you agree that we have a missing value here? You can find the snapshot here:
